channel.title: Kinda stuck, would apreciate some help

item.title: Kinda stuck, would apreciate some help
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ok well, in boolean ‘CheckForSkillUse3(int Item, int Slot)’ . . Is all my pots… And food i don’t use… Because of handler. This is what it looks like…

	public boolean CheckForSkillUse3(int Item, int Slot) {
		boolean GoOn = true;
		if (server.FoodHandler.HealItem(Item)==true) {
		if (!(duelRule[6] && duelRule[7])) {
//FoodHandler stuff here..
		} else {
		sendMessage("Food and drink have been disabled in this duel...");
		}
		} else
		switch (Item) {

duelRule[6], and duelRule[7] is drink and food. Below switch (Item) { is all the cases etc… Food, drinks, horses, and so on…

if (!(duelRule[6] && duelRule[7])) {

It’s basically saying, if its different from that, it doesn’t do below…

But my pots are below, so when you turn off pots in a duel, it turns food off aswell.

When you turn food off, you turn pots off aswell…

Does anyone know how this can be fixed?

I know this is kinda simplish… But its 9:43am … Just woke up :|…

Would really apreciate help.

Read full topic
